mapper.insert: insert into prd_info (prd_cd, jan_cd, prd_nm, prd_dtl, prd_cnt, order_no) values (#{prd_cd}, #{jan_cd}, #{prd_nm}, #{prd_dtl}, #{prd_cnt}, #{order_no})
mapper.select:
select seq_id , date_format(register_date, '%Y/%m/%d') register_date , date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date , prd_cd , jan_cd , prd_nm , prd_dtl , prd_cnt , order_no from prd_info
prd_cd like '%${prd_cd}%'
and prd_nm like '%${prd_nm}%'
order by seq_id desc

select delivery_surname, delivery_name , order_surname, order_name , prd_cd, jan_cd, prd_nm, prd_dtl , unit_no, prd_cnt, pi.order_no , baggage_claim_no from rakuten_info ri inner join prd_info pi on pi.prd_cd = ri.product_manage_no where baggage_claim_no = #{baggage_claim_no} order by prd_cd, pi.order_no
